title: The World Psychic - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/24/22
itunes:title: The World Psychic - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/24/22
description:
Guest host Connie Willis and hypnotherapist LaMont Hamilton discuss the psychic abilities he has developed since childhood, which allowed him to know when people were lying, help people make financial investments, and aided in his efforts to return the remains of his late father from Vietnam.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
